examples.example: 动物园里的大象总是能给孩子们带来无尽的欢乐。

translate.english: The elephants in the zoo can always bring endless joy to children.

examples.example: 聪明的大象经过训练后可以完成很多有趣的表演。

translate.english: Clever elephants can complete many interesting performances after training.

examples.example: 大象那庞大而温和的身影，给动物园增添了独特的魅力。

translate.english: The huge and gentle figure of the elephant adds a unique charm to the zoo.
